home.intro: I'm Samuel Chauche, 38 years old, based in Montpellier. With 7 years of experience in technical support, I'm transitioning to web development with a particular passion for Web3 and decentralized technologies.

about.title: About me
about.text: My name is Samuel Chauche, I'm 38 years old and I live in Montpellier. After 7 years of experience in technical support, I'm turning to web development with a special interest in Web3. My goal is to help build a more democratic and decentralized internet. I enjoy creating technical solutions while maintaining a user-centered approach.

projects.title: Projects
projects.empty: I'm currently working on exciting Web3 projects. Come back soon to discover my achievements!

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: Interested in my profile or a collaboration in Web3? Feel free to contact me to discuss innovative projects or professional opportunities.
contact.success: Thank you for your message! I will get back to you soon.
